meanings.sent1: The gristliest steak I ever had was so chewy.
meanings.sent2: The butcher recommended the gristliest cut for slow cooking.
meanings.sent3: I tried to eat the gristliest piece, but it felt like chewing rubber bands.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as gristly as the toughest meat.
meanings.sent5: The gristliest part of the dish was hard to swallow.

meanings.definition: the superlative form of gristly, meaning tough and sinewy
meanings.sent1: The gristliest rope in the gym was hard to climb.
meanings.sent2: The gristliest fibers in the fabric made it durable.
meanings.sent3: His gristliest muscles made him look like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The gristliest challenges in life are the most rewarding.
meanings.sent5: The gristliest path led to the most beautiful view.
